text: Headkick Facsimile is an EP by American noise rock band Cop Shoot Cop, released in 1989 by Supernatural Organization. ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Adapted from the Headkick Facsimile liner notes. ;Cop Shoot Cop *Tod Ashley – lead vocals, bass guitar *David Ouimet – sampler *Phil Puleo – drums, percussion ;Production and additional personnel *Cop Shoot Cop – production, mixing *Subvert Entertainment – cover art, design *Wharton Tiers – engineering, mixing ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format !
